classes.name: time-picker__parent-container
classes.description: Element class for the wrapping element of the component

classes.name: time-picker__time-select-container
classes.description:
Container for wrapping around time select
dropdown. Useful for setting the width of the time select field

classes.name: time-picker__timezone-select-container
classes.description:
Container for wrapping around timezone
dropdown. Useful for setting the width of the timezone select field

description: This is the Sass version of time picker. Following example displays time picker using css styles only.
name: Time Picker - Styles
usage:
Time picker styles can be added using the template in the code section above
with the classes given above.  **Note:** This CSS-only example uses the `eds-select`
component (also known as Dropdown) in its implementation for the time and
timezone dropdowns.  Styling `eds-time-picker` can be done using the classes
of the [eds-select](/select) CSS component.
